typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		actors as (name as string)[],
		availabilityDate as string,
		genre as string,
		rating as string,
		releaseYear as string,
		runtime as string,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as string,
		tier as string,
		title as string,
		id as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_ts} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SouthridgeCatalogRawOutput
SouthridgeCatalogRawOutput foldDown(unroll(actors),
	mapColumn(
		ActorName = actors.name,
		availabilityDate,
		genre,
		rating,
		releaseYear,
		runtime,
		streamingAvailabilityDate,
		tier,
		title,
		id,
		{_rid},
		{_self},
		{_etag},
		{_attachments},
		{_ts}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
